text: My dream role would probably be a psycho killer, because the whole thing I love about movies is that you get to do things you could never do in real life, and that would be my way of vicariously experiencing being a psycho killer. Also, it's incredibly romantic.
author: Christina Ricci

text: In life and in movies, it's a similar challenge, where you have expectations, and you end up in situations that are not meeting your expectations.
author: Jeff Bridges

text: Sex is a doorway to something so powerful and mystical, but movies usually depict it in a completely flat way.
author: David Lynch

text: Right now, my job is that I'm like an ambulance chaser. I've got to look for movies with white guys falling out of them.
author: Chris Rock

text: Movies have takes. But plays are like life - you don't really get takes.
author: Chris Rock
